CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Offer Accepted stage positioned above or below the HR Interview stage?
SRP.A: The Offer Accepted stage is positioned {below} the HR Interview stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Offer Accepted?
VE.A: The value of stage Offer Accepted is {22%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Technical Interview?
VE.A: The value of stage Technical Interview is {46%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Offer Extended?
VE.A: The value of stage Offer Extended is {27%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is HR Interview, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Offer Accepted, with a value of {22%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Offer Extended to stage Offer Accepted?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Offer Extended to stage Offer Accepted is {5%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage HR Interview to stage Technical Interview?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage HR Interview to stage Technical Interview is {54%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 24%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {HR Interview} stage has {100%}, the {Technical Interview} stage has {46%}, the {Offer Extended} stage has {27%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 73%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Technical Interview} stage has {46%}, the {Offer Extended} stage has {27%}, the {Offer Accepted} stage has {22%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 24% and 36%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Technical Interview to Offer Extended, or from stage HR Interview to Technical Interview?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {HR Interview} to {Technical Interview} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Technical Interview to Offer Extended, from stage Offer Extended to Offer Accepted, or from stage HR Interview to Technical Interview?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {HR Interview} to stage {Technical Interview} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {HR Interview} and {Technical Interview} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Offer Extended} and {Offer Accepted} stages.
